Pre-Game Insights: United States vice-captain Aaron Jones emphasized the team's goal to play a 'fearless' brand of cricket in the T20 World Cup.
Canada captain Saad Bin Zafar expressed his team's intention to play fearless cricket and express themselves to their potential.
The United States and Canada have been drawn in a group with India, Pakistan, and Ireland, making their debut appearance at a men's T20 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The United States and Canada are making their debut appearance at a men's T20 World Cup.
The Americans have won four of their seven men's T20Is against Canada, including a 4-0 series win in April.
The co-hosts could not have wanted a better place to start the tournament, having won six of their seven T20Is at Grand Prairie.
